SELECT article_tag_id AS articleTagId, article_tag AS articleTag FROM article_tag WHERE 1 = 1
AND is_tag != 'untag'
order by sort

SELECT a.article_id AS articleId, a.article_tag_id AS articleTag, u.user_name AS userName, u.user_phone AS userPhone, u.user_pic as userPic, a.article_title AS articleTitle, a.content, at.article_tag as articleTagName, a. status, DATE_FORMAT( a.create_time, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i' ) AS createTime FROM article a LEFT JOIN user_account u ON a.user_id = u.user_uuid LEFT JOIN article_tag at on a.article_tag_id = at.article_tag_id WHERE a.status != '2000' AND a.article_id = #{article.articleId}
